overview: The Gold Standard is New York’s #1 Gold Buyer and the leading gold dealer in Oceanside. The company buys gold, silver, diamonds, platinum, watches & estate jewelries. The Gold Standard is a proud member of the Jeweler’s Vigilance Committee & won 1st place in the Best of L.I. Gold Buyers 2011. They offer exceptional service, a friendly environment and the highest payout in the industry. Furthermore, they promise their customers 100% Satisfaction, 110% Price Guarantee, No Minimum Weights, No Hidden Fees and Cash Paid on the Spot.
